title: Ticket #4360: python-bindings compile errors on EL5 for PROPER builds
description: Doing a PROPER build of 8.1.5 on EL5, src/python-bindings/schedd.cpp fails to compile with some boost::python errors, apparently related to the version of boost available on EL5.
remarks:
2014-Jun-11 13:18:29 by bbockelm:
A fix has been pushed to branch V8_3-gt4360. Can you test? If so, the commit can be cherry-picked to any branch you'd like.

2015-Aug-01 21:26:16 by bbockelm:
This has since been resolved.
